Desc.entry: Free information service for parents of children and young people who have significant health needs, special educational needs or a disability, and professionals who support them. Has a library for parents and books for adults and children to explain health conditions and disabilities to siblings and family. Can provide information on sources of support, eg self-help groups, appropriate local and national voluntary organisations, statutory services and how to access them, special educational needs support, leisure/holiday information, mobility and equipment. Produces disability information packs. Self or any referral.
